content.question: Which of the following best describes the overall trend in England’s imports from Asia, Africa, and America as shown in the table?

choices.label: England’s volume of imports increased, and consumables contributed the greatest increase per year.
England’s volume of imports decreased, and raw materials contributed the greatest decrease per year.
England’s volume of imports increased, and manufactures contributed the greatest increase per year.
England’s volume of imports decreased, and each category contributed an equal decrease per year.

content.answer: England’s volume of imports increased, and consumables contributed the greatest increase per year.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
